ruleContent.content:
<js>
url=String(result.match(/(http.*.m3u8)","u/)[1]).replace(/\\/g,'');
java.log(url);
if(book.durChapterIndex==chapter.index){
java.startBrowser(url,chapter.title)
java.toast('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待')
}
t=java.get("t")
img=java.get("img")
' \n\n【刷新正文】或【点击章节链接】跳转播放\n🔗直链:\n'+url+'\n'+t+img
</js>

ruleExplore.name: tag.span@text

ruleSearch.author: class.w-full@tag.p.4@text&&class.w-full@tag.p.5@text
ruleSearch.name: class.w-full@tag.p.0@text

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
sourceUrl='https://cooingc.cc/'
java.log(baseUrl)
let result = java.getElement('tag.button').toString();
const startIndex = result.indexOf("href='/");
const endIndex = result.indexOf("/'");
const endUrl = result.substring(startIndex+7, endIndex);
java.log(endUrl)
url=sourceUrl+endUrl+'/'
java.log(url)
</js>
